_comment: All sensitive values should be provided via environment variables or Azure App Settings
_comment2: Connection string should be set via ConnectionStrings__Database environment variable
_comment3: JWT settings should be set via Jwt__SecretKey, Jwt__Issuer, Jwt__Audience environment variables
_comment4: Spotify settings should be set via Spotify__ClientId, Spotify__ClientSecret, Spotify__RedirectUri environment variables
